short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes the infinite spinner bug on Amazon Vine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension fixes a common issue that Amazon Vine users run into where items can be stuck loading forever, often referred to as the "infinite spinner bug".

This extension does not collect, store or send any data whatsoever. It has a single purpose: to fix the infinite spinner bug.
